languages.text: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} with a {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged weapon{/g} within {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} range, the target gains +1 stack of the {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g} effect. Perplexed: this creature suffers a −10 penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, Weapon Skill, Intelligence, and Perception {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} for each stack of this effect.
languages.original_text: Когда обладатель {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}поражает{/g} цель из {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}дистанционного{/g} оружия вблизи, цель получает +1 уровень эффекта {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}замешательство{/g}. Замешательство: каждый уровень эффекта накладывает на цель штраф −10 при {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверках{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальнего Боя{/g}, Ближнего Боя, Интеллекта и Восприятия.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the wielder hits with a ranged weapon within melee range, the target gains 1 stack of the perplexed effect. Perplexed :This creature suffers a −10 penalty to Ballistic Skill, Weapon Skill, Intelligence, and Perception checks for each level of this effect.

Whenever the wearer hits with a ranged weapon within melee range, the target gains +1 stack of the perplexed effect. Perplexed : this creature suffers a −10 penalty to Ballistic Skill, Weapon Skill, Intelligence, and Perception checks for each level of this effect.

Whenever the wearer hits with a ranged weapon within melee range, the target gains +1 stack of the perplexed effect. Perplexed : this creature suffers a −10 penalty to Ballistic Skill, Weapon Skill, Intelligence, and Perception checks for each level of this effect.

Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} with a {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged weapon{/g} within {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} range, the target gains +1 stack of the {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g} effect. Perplexed: this creature suffers a −10 penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, Weapon Skill, Intelligence, and Perception {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} for each stack of this effect.

languages.text: Когда обладатель {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}поражает{/g} цель из {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}дистанционного{/g} оружия вблизи, цель получает +1 уровень эффекта {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}замешательство{/g}. Замешательство: каждый уровень эффекта накладывает на цель штраф −10 при {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверках{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальнего Боя{/g}, Ближнего Боя, Интеллекта и Восприятия.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer hits with a ranged weapon within melee range, the target gains +1 stack of the perplexed effect. Perplexed : this creature suffers a −10 penalty to Ballistic Skill, Weapon Skill, Intelligence, and Perception checks for each level of this effect.

traits.locale_text: Когда обладатель поражает цель из дистанционного оружия вблизи, цель получает +1 уровень эффекта "замешательство". Замешательство: каждый уровень эффекта накладывает на цель штраф −10 при проверках Дальнего Боя, Ближнего Боя, Интеллекта и Восприятия.

Когда обладатель поражает цель из дистанционного оружия вблизи, цель получает +1 уровень эффекта "замешательство". Замешательство: каждый уровень эффекта накладывает на цель штраф −10 при проверках Дальнего Боя, Ближнего Боя, Интеллекта и Восприятия.

languages.text: 每当装备者在{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战{/g}范围内使用{g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}远程武器{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}目标时，目标都会获得1层{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}困惑{/g}效果。 困惑：每层效果都会使目标生物的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}、武器技能、智力与感知{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}受到-10减值。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} with a {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged weapon{/g} within {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} range, the target gains +1 stack of the {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g} effect. Perplexed: this creature suffers a −10 penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, Weapon Skill, Intelligence, and Perception {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} for each stack of this effect.

traits.locale_text: 每当装备者在{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战{/g}范围内使用{g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}远程武器{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}目标时，目标都会获得1层{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}困惑{/g}效果。 困惑：每层效果都会使目标生物的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}、武器技能、智力与感知{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}受到-10减值。

languages.text: Cuando el portador {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacta{/g} con un {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}arma a distancia{/g} estando a alcance {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}cuerpo a cuerpo{/g}, el objetivo obtiene +1 acumulación del efecto {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplejo{/g}. Perplejo: la criatura sufre una penalización −10 a sus {g|Encyclopedia:Test}pruebas{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g}, Habilidad de armas, Inteligencia y Percepción por cada acumulación de este efecto.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} with a {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged weapon{/g} within {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} range, the target gains +1 stack of the {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g} effect. Perplexed: this creature suffers a −10 penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, Weapon Skill, Intelligence, and Perception {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} for each stack of this effect.

traits.locale_text: Cuando el portador impacta con un arma a distancia estando a {g|Encyclopedia:Range}alcance{/g} cuerpo a cuerpo, el objetivo obtiene 1 acumulación del efecto {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplejo{/g}. Perplejo: la criatura sufre una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} -10 a sus pruebas de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Inteligencia{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g} por cada nivel de este efecto.

languages.text: 着用者が{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接{/g}射程内に{g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}遠隔武器{/g}を{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}させた時、ターゲットは{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}混乱{/g}効果を+1スタック与える。 混乱：この生物は{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}射撃技能{/g}、近接攻撃、知性、認知力{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に、この効果1スタックにつき-10のペナルティを受ける。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} with a {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged weapon{/g} within {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} range, the target gains +1 stack of the {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g} effect. Perplexed: this creature suffers a −10 penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, Weapon Skill, Intelligence, and Perception {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} for each stack of this effect.

traits.locale_text: 着用者が近接{g|Encyclopedia:Range}射程{/g}内に遠隔武器を命中させた時、ターゲットは{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}混乱{/g}効果を+1スタック与える。 混乱：この生物は{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弾道スキル{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器スキル{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}知性{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}知覚{/g}判定に、この効果1スタックにつき-10の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を受ける。

languages.text: Erzielt der Träger in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampf{/g}-Reichweite einen {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Treffer{/g} mit einer {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}Fernkampfwaffe{/g}, erhält das Ziel +1 Stapel des {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Überrascht{/g}-Effektes. Überrascht: Diese Kreatur wird für jeden Stapel dieses Effektes mit einem Abzug von −10 auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fähigkeit{/g}-, Waffenfähigkeit-, Intelligenz- und Wahrnehmung-{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Proben{/g} belegt.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} with a {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged weapon{/g} within {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} range, the target gains +1 stack of the {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g} effect. Perplexed: this creature suffers a −10 penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, Weapon Skill, Intelligence, and Perception {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} for each stack of this effect.

traits.locale_text: Immer wenn der Träger mit einer Fernkampfwaffe in Nahkampf{g|Encyclopedia:Range}reichweite{/g} trifft, bekommt das Ziel +1 auf den Stapel des Effekts {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Überrascht{/g}. Überrascht : Diese Kreatur bekommt für jede Stufe dieses Effekts −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} auf Proben auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fähigkeit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligenz{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g}.

Immer wenn der Träger in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampf{/g}-Reichweite mit einer {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}Fernkampfwaffe{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}trifft{/g}, erhält das Ziel +1 Stapel des {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}Effekts{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Überrascht{/g}. Überrascht: Diese Kreatur erleidet für jede Stufe dieses Effekts einen {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −10 auf {g|Encyclopedia:Test}Proben{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fertigkeit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligenz{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g}.

languages.text: Chaque fois que l'utilisateur inflige un {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}coup{/g} à l'aide d'une {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}arme à distance{/g} à portée de combat de {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}mêlée{/g}, la cible acquiert +1 cumul de l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Perplexité{/g}. Perplexité : cette créature subit une pénalité de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Capacité de Tir{/g}, de Capacité de Combat, d'Intelligence et de Perception de −10 par cumul de cet effet pour tous ses {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} with a {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged weapon{/g} within {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} range, the target gains +1 stack of the {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g} effect. Perplexed: this creature suffers a −10 penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, Weapon Skill, Intelligence, and Perception {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} for each stack of this effect.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que l'utilisateur inflige un coup à l'aide d'une arme à distance à {g|Encyclopedia:Range}portée{/g} de combat de mêlée, la cible acquiert +1 cumul de l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Perplexité{/g}. Perplexité  : cette créature subit une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Compétence Balistique{/g}, de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Compétence d'Arme{/g}, d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} de -10 par niveau de cet effet.

Chaque fois que l'utilisateur inflige un {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}coup{/g} à l'aide d'une arme {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}à distance{/g} à portée de combat de {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}mêlée{/g}, la cible acquiert +1 cumul de l'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Perplexité{/g}. Perplexité : cette créature subit une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Capacité de Tir{/g}, de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de Combat{/g}, d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} de −10 par niveau de cet effet pour tous ses {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g}.

languages.text: Takan kişi, {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş{/g} menzilindeyken {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}menzilli silahla{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurduğunda{/g} hedef, +1 {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}şaşkınlık{/g} etkisi birikimi kazanır. Şaşkınlık: Yaratık, bu etkinin her birikimi için {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Balistik Yetenek{/g}, Silah Yeteneği, Zekâ ve Algı {g|Encyclopedia:Test}testlerine{/g} −10 ceza puanı alır.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} with a {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged weapon{/g} within {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} range, the target gains +1 stack of the {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g} effect. Perplexed: this creature suffers a −10 penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, Weapon Skill, Intelligence, and Perception {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} for each stack of this effect.
